EmailTemplate.subject: You're Confirmed
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://pivotal.io/event/cloud-native-workshop/kansas-city]]> Thank you for registering for the upcoming Cloud Native Workshop in Kansas City. Please see event details below:
Date: Wednesday, November 2, 2016 Time: 10:30 AM - 4:30 PM Location: Sporting Club Events, 1 Sporting Way, Kansas City, KS 66111
{{my.Save the Date}}
If you have any further questions, please contact Sharath Sahadevan at ssahadevan@pivotal.io <[[mailto:ssahadevan@pivotal.io]]>.
